languages.text: "Это точно не ссылка. Иначе бы ваше суждение можно было распространить на маршала и других арбитров в Просторе Коронус. Мы здесь потому, что Империуму нужна десятина, ни больше ни меньше".

"This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."
languages.original_text: "Это точно не ссылка. Иначе бы ваше суждение можно было распространить на маршала и других арбитров в Просторе Коронус. Мы здесь потому, что Империуму нужна десятина, ни больше ни меньше".

languages.text: 「追放ではありません。もしそうなら、将帥やコロヌス・エクスパンスのすべてのアービトレイターにも同じことが言えるはずです。私たちがここにいるのは、帝国が租税を必要としているから、ただそれだけです」
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: 「追放ではありません。もしそうなら、将帥やコロヌス・エクスパンスのすべてのアービトレイターにも同じことが言えるはずです。私たちがここにいるのは、帝国が租税を必要としているから、ただそれだけです」

languages.text: "Es ist keine Verbannung. Ansonsten würde das ja auch für den Marschall und alle anderen Arbitratoren in der Koronus-Ausdehnung gelten. Wir sind hier, weil das Imperium den Zehnt braucht, das ist der ganze Grund."
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist keine Verbannung. Ansonsten würde das ja auch für den Marschall und alle anderen Arbitratoren in der Koronus-Ausdehnung gelten. Wir sind hier, weil das Imperium den Zehnt braucht, das ist der ganze Grund."

languages.text: « Il ne s'agit pas d'un bannissement. Sinon, le maréchal et tous les autres arbitrators des Étendues seraient dans une position identique. Nous sommes ici, car l'Imperium a besoin de percevoir cette dîme, voilà tout. »
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne s'agit pas d'un bannissement. Sinon, le maréchal et tous les autres arbitrators des Étendues seraient dans une position identique. Nous sommes ici, car l'Imperium a besoin de percevoir cette dîme, voilà tout. »

languages.text: «Esto no es un exilio. De lo contrario podría decirse lo mismo del mariscal, y de todos los demás Arbitrator que hay en la Extensión de Koronus. Estamos aquí porque el Imperium necesita su diezmo, no hay más vuelta de hoja».
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es un exilio. De lo contrario podría decirse lo mismo del mariscal, y de todos los demás Arbitrator que hay en la Extensión de Koronus. Estamos aquí porque el Imperium necesita su diezmo, no hay más vuelta de hoja».

languages.text: “这并不是流放，否则科罗努斯扩区所有其他法务官也同样相当于遭到了流放。我们来这里，是因为帝国需要在这里征收什一税，事情就是这样。”
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: “这并不是流放，否则科罗努斯扩区所有其他法务官也同样相当于遭到了流放。我们来这里，是因为帝国需要在这里征收什一税，事情就是这样。”

languages.text: "Bu bir sürgün değil. Aksi takdirde aynı şey, Miralay ve Koronus Enginliği'ndeki diğer tüm Yargıcılar için de söylenebilirdi. Burada bulunmamızın tek sebebi, İmparatorluk'un aşara ihtiyacı olması. Hepsi bu."
languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bir sürgün değil. Aksi takdirde aynı şey, Miralay ve Koronus Enginliği'ndeki diğer tüm Yargıcılar için de söylenebilirdi. Burada bulunmamızın tek sebebi İmparatorluk'un aşara ihtiyacı olması. Hepsi bu."

languages.original_text: "This isn't banishment. Otherwise, the same would apply to the Marshal and all other Arbitrators in the Koronus Expanse. We are here because the Imperium needs its tithe, and that's all there is to it."
